value:
$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Aaannnd...gotcha! All right, Prince
Alfonse, time for a little game of
guess who! Heehee... Go on, guess!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|H-hey! Whoever it is had better
stop fooling around!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Tsk, tsk! Where is your patience, my
charming, young prince? I'll need to
hear your answer first, my darling!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Fine... Then it must be...Charlotte?$k$p$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|How'd you know?! You must have
recognized the warmth and charm
of your beloved Charlotte!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Your voice gave it away, honestly.
Now, would you mind letting go of
me...please?$k$pI'm not sure where you've gotten
the idea that you're my beloved
or I'm your darling...$k$p$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|Do you really need an explanation?
Because we get along so well!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Ah...right. Well, we should always
endeavor to strengthen our bonds...$k$pNow, if you don't mind, I must
be going now.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Hmph! Acting all high and mighty...
Well, you won't be able to resist
my charms forever!$k$p$WmMPID_ブノワ,ch05_56_Benoit_M_Normal,Face|Still at it even in Askr, huh? I guess
it's true: some things never change...$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_58_Orochi_F_Normal,Face|Where there's royalty, you'll find
Charlotte performing that act
of hers.$k$p$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|Royalty's royalty, Askran or not,
so why should I act any different?$k$pI simply MUST marry into a family
that's well-off. If I have to do so
in another world, that's fine by me!$k$pPlus the prince is so kindhearted
and full of life...and of course, most
importantly, the heir to the throne!$k$p$WmMPID_ニュクス,ch05_57_Nyx_F_Normal,Face|Hasn't Prince Xander scolded
you about your little "damsel in
distress" act?$k$p$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|Rrrr... Is it so WRONG for a girl to
pursue her dreams? Why don't you
all mind your own business?$k$pPrince Alfonse is the one—I know it!
Now, after all my preparation, it's my
time to finally marry into money!$k$p$WmMPID_オロチ,ch05_58_Orochi_F_Normal,Face|He's "the one," is he? Hm...$k$p$WmMPID_ブノワ,ch05_56_Benoit_M_Normal,Face|I hear the prince is no fool... What if
he's seen through the game you're
playing already?$k$p$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|Oh, please. The Order of Heroes
has no idea what I'm really like.$k$pAs far as they know, I'm just sweet,
innocent Charlotte. And we're going
to keep it that way, aren't we?$k$p...AREN'T we?!$k$p$WmMPID_ニュクス,ch05_57_Nyx_F_Normal,Face|Sweet and innocent are the last
words I'd use to describe you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Normal,Face|You're one to talk. I'm not the only
one who's more than meets the eye.$k$p...I'll tell you what. Why don't we all
take this opportunity to re-examine
ourselves, then, hm?$k$pNew world, new us. What do you
say to that?$k$p
